Send texts, photos, videos, and audio me: Aika rubutu, hotuna, bidiyo, da saƙonni na sauti zuwa ga abokanka na kusa.
Sign up with phone number: Yi rajista tare da lambar waya
Successfully sent friend request!: An yi nasarar aika buƙatar aboki!
No changes has been made!: Babu wani canji da aka yi!
Success: Nasara ... ',' An sabunta bayananku cikin nasara!
An error occurred while trying: Kuskure ya faru yayin ƙoƙarin ɗora hoto na hoto!
Da fatan za a zaɓi aƙalla abokai biyu.
Add friends and start conversations: Addara abokai kuma fara tattaunawa da su. Tattaunawar ku zata bayyana anan
An error occurred while trying to load P: Kuskure ya faru yayin ƙoƙarin ɗora hoto na hoto!
Da fatan za a shigar da ingantacciyar lambar waya.
This code is invalid: Wannan lambar ba daidai ba ce
field(s) must not be empty or invalid!: filin (s) dole ne ya zama fanko ko rashin aiki!
This user does not exist. Please check y: Babu wannan mai amfanin. Da fatan za a duba lambar wayarku ko ƙirƙirar sabon asusu.
The email address is badly formatted: Adireshin imel ba shi da kyau
The given password is invalid: Kalmar sirri da aka bayar bata da inganci. [Kalmar wucewa ya zama aƙalla haruffa 6]
The email address is already in use by a: Adireshin imel ya riga ya yi amfani da wani asusun
The password is invalid or the user does: Kalmar sirri bata aiki ko mai amfani bashi da kalmar wucewa
There is no user record corresponding to: Babu rikodin mai amfani daidai da wannan mai ganowa. Mai yiwuwa an share mai amfani.
Too many unsuccessful login attempts: Mun katange duk buƙatun daga wannan na'urar saboda abubuwan da ba a saba gani ba. Sake gwadawa daga baya. [Yunkurin shigowa da yawa da yawa. Da fatan a sake gwadawa daga baya. ]
This user does not exist: Babu wannan mai amfanin. Da fatan za a bincika takardun shaidarka.
Password should be at least 6 characters: Kalmar wucewa ya zama aƙalla haruffa 6
Email is a required field: Email yanki ne da ake buƙata
First Name is a required field: Sunan Farko filin da ake buƙata
Send and receive translated messages, ca: Aika da karɓar saƙonnin da aka fassara, kira, da hira ta bidiyo tare da abokanka
Send messagess, call or video chat with: Aika rikici, kira ko tattaunawar bidiyo tare da abokanka kyauta
Send photos and videos in group chats or: Aika hotuna da bidiyo a cikin tattaunawar rukuni ko saƙonni na sirri
Translate your chat messages in real tim: Fassara saƙonnin tattaunawa a cikin lokaci na ainihi
You can't create groups: Ba za ku iya ƙirƙirar ƙungiyoyi ba
You don't have enough friends to create: Ba ku da isassun abokai don ƙirƙirar ƙungiyoyi. Atara aƙalla aboki 2 don iya ƙirƙirar ƙungiyoyi
